# Benchmark Framework Desktop Mainboard and 4-node cluster

Testing the [Framework Desktop](https://frame.work/desktop) - AMD Ryzen AI Max+ 395 with Radeon 8090S. (Four pre-production units were shipped to me for local cluster testing).

## Single Node configuration (128 GB RAM):

[![Image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/481677/475718422-78791530-a491-463b-8c8e-6b94883b2b19.jpeg?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..DqPhCpxhRiZ9K2UfY_vzi8ZgYh62DIFvVGMC1B8_c_g)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/481677/475718422-78791530-a491-463b-8c8e-6b94883b2b19.jpeg?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..DqPhCpxhRiZ9K2UfY_vzi8ZgYh62DIFvVGMC1B8_c_g)

## Cluster configuration (4x Mainboard - 512 GB RAM)

[![Image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/481677/475719431-140425ff-2110-4301-9e92-dc2807b3c277.jpg?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NTQ1OTU3MjMsIm5iZiI6MTc1NDU5NTQyMywicGF0aCI6Ii80ODE2NzcvNDc1NzE5NDMxLTE0MDQyNWZmLTIxMTAtNDMwMS05ZTkyLWRjMjgwN2IzYzI3Ny5qcGc_.A7fvIex6Qtcw2lpUxJ-6pFxoJU9naCp3Fe0_Y50eF5Q)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/481677/475719431-140425ff-2110-4301-9e92-dc2807b3c277.jpg?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NTQ1OTU3MjMsIm5iZiI6MTc1NDU5NTQyMywicGF0aCI6Ii80ODE2NzcvNDc1NzE5NDMxLTE0MDQyNWZmLTIxMTAtNDMwMS05ZTkyLWRjMjgwN2IzYzI3Ny5qcGc_.A7fvIex6Qtcw2lpUxJ-6pFxoJU9naCp3Fe0_Y50eF5Q)

Initial tests (above) were run using 2.5 Gbps Ethernet interconnect.

[![Image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/481677/475719725-da027dbf-864c-47d2-ad87-2917285de6c9.jpeg?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..3bKH5IPo2Mb2KCva5B3H15-LIVgFgnQy-vjcYyWZaYE)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/481677/475719725-da027dbf-864c-47d2-ad87-2917285de6c9.jpeg?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..3bKH5IPo2Mb2KCva5B3H15-LIVgFgnQy-vjcYyWZaYE)

I later changed to 5 Gbps using a NICGIGA switch, and racked it in a black T1 mini rack shipped by DeskPi, along with four of their currently-in-prototype Framework Desktop mini rack trays. [Mini rack build showcase here](https://github.com/geerlingguy/mini-rack/issues/234).

I also tested Thunderbolt node-to-node interconnects, but could only get 10 Gbps over TB4 using `thunderbolt0`/`thunderbolt1` interfaces).

For more benchmarks (focusing on CPU, GPU, disk, net, etc.), see:

*   [I clustered four Framework Mainboards to test huge LLMs](https://www.jeffgeerling.com/blog/2025/i-clustered-four-framework-mainboards-test-huge-llms)
*   [sbc-reviews: Framework Desktop](https://github.com/geerlingguy/sbc-reviews/issues/80).

All my automation for testing is in the [Beowulf AI Cluster](https://github.com/geerlingguy/beowulf-ai-cluster) repo.
